OOC: You do realize thats your opinion right?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
>  You shouldn't be complaining anyway. Veratis is about to get 2 of 
> the biggest breakthroughs in all science if he meets with Mustex.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> >  Sorry I'm new at this. I like to think that Rhesus is the 
biggest 
> > lowlife supplier of equipment on the planet. That would mean 
> > Foxfingers might have been making a purchase when something 
slipped?
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > > Where did Mustex get information about Veratis? Megaton didn't 
> say 
> > anything
> > > and knowledge about his existence has been limited to a few 
words 
> > about his
> > > agenda dureing a fight at the Cybertronian fire. Since landing 
> > Veratis
> > > hasn't left the area that his ship landed in.
> > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > From: <dewboy30816@y...>
> > > To: <nbwrpg@y...>
> > > Sent: Wednesday, July 18, 2001 3:48 PM
> > > Subject: Rhesus
> > > 
> > > 
> > > > Rhesus stood,pearly white,at a head shorter than Rattrap. He 
was
> > > > poised with his only weapon, a reflective staff. The 2 small 
> > cannons
> > > > fired and he deflected both shots. Then his incredible senses
> > > > detected a slight soundless shift in the metal beneath his 
> feet. 
> > He
> > > > quickly turned,hurled the staff at the source,and jumped away 
> > from the
> > > > next 2 beams. He then stared astonished as Mustex caught the 
> > staff in
> > > > mid flight.
> > > > Rhesus:Computer,deactivate firing pattern. You've improved.
> > > > Mustex:Shutup. I'm here to ask for your help. I need to find 
the
> > > > Mutants. I need Veratis to pinpoint how Stallex started as a 
> baby 
> > and
> > > > worked his way up to this age. With Veratis' access to 
> protoforms
> > > > maybe I can force him to create dozens of new Maximal babies.
> > > > Rhesus:No.
> > > > Mustex:Come on. You weren't always a piece of slime. Do you 
> > remember
> > > > why you
> > > > carry that staff.
> > > > Rhesus:No.
> > > > Mustex:Well I do, because you have to much honor to carry a 
> > blaster.
> > > > Rhesus:Go away.
> > > > Mustex:Fine then! Maybe my best friend died with the other 
> > Carnitrons.
> > > > Rhesus:I always told you times change.
> > > > Mustex:Finish your own quote, but warriors never do!
> > > >
> > > >  I have no intentions of vastly using Rhesus. He's just 
another 
> > Trump
> > > > card
> > > > for Mustex(the first being Stallex). He'll probably just jump 
> out 
> > from
> > > > behind a boulder and save Mustex or Stallex's circuits.
